source:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_00 Quest Sync
Rozol Cattlan the Prudent requests the aid of a skilled Disciple of the Hand.
※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 6 and above.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_00特殊ルール： レベルアジャスト
※本クエストは、クラフタークラス：レベル6以上、
　バトルクラス：レベル45以上推奨です。

エカトル実験場の財務のロゾル・カットランは、冒険者に製作の依頼があるようだ。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_01Rozol Cattlan the Prudent has asked for your assistance in the crafting of high-quality components for the Dezul Qualan's cockpit exterior. However, before you can gain access to the facilities necessary for the synthesis, you must first find a way to bribe the young Highwind Skyways representative in charge of overseeing the equipment. Rozol believes you may be able to achieve this with a saint carp─a rare type of fish living in the frigid waters of the Coerthas River to the west of the Observatorium. It is said that saint carp are best caught with moth pupae.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_01※本クエストには「 レベルアジャスト」が、
　設定されています。

財務のロゾル・カットランから「」の製作を依頼された。まずは漁師になった状態で、クルザス中央高地のアドネール占星台の西にある「クルザス川」から「」を釣り上げよう。「」は「」などの淡水用の釣り餌で釣ることができる。

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_02<tab>You have caught a saint carp. Now hurry the fish to Templeton at the Observatorium while it is still fresh, and convince the corrupt lad to grant you use of the crafting facilities. It may also be wise to allow him to inspect the materials entrusted to you by Rozol, so as not to arouse suspicion amongst his ever-watching superiors.
target: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_02<tab><var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89F601 /var>を釣り上げた。アドネール占星台の「テンペルトン」に「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89F601 /var>」と「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89F501 /var>」を渡し、製作施設の使用許可をもらおう。

source:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_03Templeton is every bit as unscrupulous as advertised, and now you have full access to the Highwind Skyways temporary crafting facilities. Use the materials given to you by Rozol and inspected by Templeton to synthesize two high-quality cockpit exterior components, and deliver the finished products to Ehcatl.

※In the event that the status Facility Access: Production II wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Templeton.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_03製作施設の準備が整った。「」をもとに「」を2つ製作し、エカトル実験場の「財務のロゾル・カットラン」に納品しよう。

※バフステータス「製作施設：部材工作II」が終了した場合や、「」を失った場合は、再びテンペルトンに話しかけましょう。バフステータスと材料が付与され、再挑戦が可能になります。

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_04<tab>You have delivered the cockpit exterior components to Rozol Cattlan the Prudent and, as much as it pains him to do so, he begins to see why Chief Sezul Totoloc has elected to place his trust in a “featherless neuker.” As for the crooked Skyways representative─it might be best that, for now, his supervisors remain unaware of your mutually beneficial relationship with the young man.
target: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SEQ_04<tab>財務のロゾル・カットランに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8100)) 01 /var>を納品した。冒険者を仲間に引き入れたセズル・トトロックの慧眼に、いたく感服するロゾル。一方で、頼りない社員ひとりに出張所をまかせるハイウィンド飛空社の人材配置には、やや不安が残るようだ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_00<tab>As a fisher, catch a saint carp from the Coerthas River.
target: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_00<tab>漁師になり、クルザス川で<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E89F601 /var>を釣る

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_01<tab>Present the cockpit exterior component materials and the saint carp to Templeton at the Observatorium.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_01アドネール占星台のテンペルトンにと
を渡す

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize cockpit exterior components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the cockpit exterior components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Rozol Cattlan the Prudent)) /var>.
target: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TODO_02<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((製作手帳 蛮族クエストLv6：<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8100)) 01 /var>を製作)) ((財務のロゾル・カットランに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　8100)) 01 /var>を納品)) /var>

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_000<tab>Sqwak sqwak! Featherless one! Sqwak! Our chieftain, speaks highly of you, he does. Sqwak! Trust you, I don't! Yet, trust you, I must! Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_000ッン！
その腕を見込んで、高品質な「」を2つほど、
頼みたいんですわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_010<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, a cockpit, she needs─a fine cockpit with a fine exterior and strong wind-shielding! Sqwak! Keeps bugs from beaks, it shall! Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_010実は、急加速にも耐える合金板が入用でしてなッァ。
材料は用意しましたんで、クルザス中央高地の
アドネール占星台で、製作をお頼みしたいんですわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_020<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, a cockpit, she needs─a fine cockpit with a fine exterior and bold colors! Sqwak! Let the Nine's enemies know we come, it shall! Sqwak! Let our ancestors know we fly once again, it shall! Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_020実は、とびきりワルな塗料が入用でしてなッァ。
材料は用意しましたんで、クルザス中央高地の
アドネール占星台で、製作をお頼みしたいんですわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_030<tab>The <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>, a cockpit, she needs─a fine cockpit with a fine exterior and thick lining of cloth and leather. Sqwak! Keep out the biting cold, it shall! Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_030実は、布やら革やらを張った合板が入用でしてなッァ。
材料は用意しましたんで、クルザス中央高地の
アドネール占星台で、製作をお頼みしたいんですわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_040<tab>Require much care in crafting, do such things. Proper equipment, one must have. Yet proper equipment, have you not. Sqwak! Upon favored Nine, though, does luck smile. Such equipment, close it does lie. At the Observatorium, it does lie, watched over by featherless one such as you. Templeton─a man most corrupt. Sqwak sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_040そこにハイウィンド飛空社の製作設備があるとかッァ。
タタラム坊やいわく、責任者の「テンペルトン」って男に
手みやげを渡せば、使い放題だそうですわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_041<tab>Rotten, he is─like fallen apple! Like flyblown corpse! Feed his greed, you must. Sqwak! Feed with saint carp! Sqwak! A moth-craving saint carp from river of Coerthas. Feed his greed, and facilities, yours, they shall be! But remember, first, his game, you must play. Materials, he must inspect. Approval, he must give. Sqwak sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_041手みやげですが……その男は占星台西の「クルザス川」で釣れる、
「」を欲しがってるって話ですわッァ！
淡水用のエサ、あたりで釣っていってもらえますかッァ？

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_050<tab>Sqwak sqwak! Money, time is! Sqwak! Hurry and feed Templeton's greed, you must. Feed with saint carp! Saint carp from river of Coerthas. Cravers of moths, carp are. Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_050手みやげですが……その男は占星台西の「クルザス川」で釣れる、
「」を欲しがってるって話ですわッァ！
淡水用のエサ、あたりで釣っていってもらえますかッァ？

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_070<tab>Sure, one might say 'tis better to be in here by a warm fire than out in the cold chopping wood with the commonfolk, but what good is a fire, I ask, without, say, a freshly caught carp to roast over its coals?
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_070えっ、ここを使わせてほしいですって？
いえいえ、タダってわけにはいきませんねっ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_071<tab>Why, a freshly caught carp to roast over these coals! How very thoughtful of you! The astrologians will be as pleased as punch!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_071これは「」？
こんな貴重なものをいただいては、頼みは断れませんねっ！
料理して地元のみなさんにお配りすると、喜ばれるんですよ。

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_072<tab>What? You believed these tender morsels for myself? Pah! It pains me to learn you think so little of good Templeton, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((man)) /var>. A slice of fat carp on the plates of the right persons, and it won't be long before I'm transferred out of this frozen wasteland to somewhere the sky is blue and the sea bluer.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_072くふふふ……これで地元に媚びを売って顧客を獲得できれば、
私も胸糞悪い辺境勤務から、脱出できますし……。
あっ、今の本音は聞かなかったことにしてくださいねっ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_073<tab>Very well, then. Feel free to use the facilities as you see fit. Just try not to damage anything. A lot of unnecessary paperwork that would be. Ah, and I suppose you shall be wanting these materials returned, as well. Hm? Did I inspect them thoroughly? I don't know. Did it <var 1A 02 /var>appear<var 1A 01 /var> that I did? Good then! <wink> <wink>
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_073ささ、預かった材料は、このとおりお返ししますっ。
ここの設備はご自由にお使いくださいっ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_100<tab>If you need aught else, feel free to ask. I'll be right here charring this carp to perfection.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_000_100材料が必要でしたら、私からお渡ししますっ。
また使いたいときには、ひと声かけてくださいねっ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_100_100<tab>It appears you've completed that contraption of yours. I shall not ask what it is for if you promise to remove it from here at once. It would be simply tragic if one of my supervisors were to walk in and I had to tell them of how you threatened to bludgeon me with a frozen carp─<var 1A 02 /var>two<var 1A 01 /var> frozen carp─if I didn't allow you access to our equipment. <wink> <wink>
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_TEMPLETON_100_100おや？　もう納品に行かなくてよろしいのですかっ？
もしも製作した品をなくしたりして、作りなおすときは、
私に声をかけてくださいねっ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_130<tab>Sqwak sqwak! Come, have you, with components sought? Or failed, have you, like featherless neuker you are? Sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_130どうでしょうッゥ？
「」製作の進捗のほうはッァ……？

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_131<tab>Your work...acceptable, it is. Perhaps more than... Perhaps not. The engineers, pleased they will be. Perhaps... Sqwak...
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_131おおっ、見事な仕上がりですなッァ！
職人仕事はカラッキシの私にも、絶品だとわかりますわッァ。
、エエ仕事しましたなッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_132<tab>Bah! Sqwak! Merely one job among many, this was! Sqwak sqwak! Place trust in featherless neuker, I still do not......yet understand why chieftain does...I may...or may not! Sqwak sqwak!
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_ROZOLCATTLAN_000_132セズルの旦那は、エエ人材をスカウトしましたなッァ。
ひとつ、これからもよろしく頼みますわッァ！

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SYSTEM_200_200本クエストで製作した「NQアイテム」を所持しています。
このアイテムは、使用することはありません。
売却もできませんので、不用でしたら破棄してください。

source: TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SYSTEM_000_900<tab>To complete this quest, you will need to change your class to fisher by equipping a fishing rod.
target:
TEXT_BANIXA301_01514_SYSTEM_000_900本クエストでは、「漁師」のクラスが必要となります。
漁師の「主道具」と「釣り餌」を準備して進めましょう！
